snippet.title: Dragoneila [Teaser Dragon MMORPG]
snippet.description:
#Dragon #MMORPG #Dragoneila
Dragoneila is a exciting MMORPG game with updated game techniques and mechanics. We decided to abandon the standard MMORPG systems and want to show a new vision of game mechanics and interaction with the world. We want to show that the players completely influence the life of the world, where every action, every deed has a consequence. Only the players decide what the world will be like. You yourself have the right to decide to kill someone or to enter anyone into an alliance. In the world of Dragoneila, all animals and monsters have their own thoughts, their own views on the world, you can get along with them or start a war, they will become your allies or you want to completely destroy their existence – it’s up to you.

More information:

Our website
https://dragoneila.ru/en
